meta.title: Home - Prior Lake Savage Area Schools

meta.content: Home, Prior Lake Savage Area Schools
Home - Prior Lake Savage Area Schools
Home - Prior Lake Savage Area Schools

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

input.name: q
input.title: search
input.style: width: 100%; padding: 0px; border: none; margin: -0.0625em 0px 0px; height: 1.25em; outline: none;

p.span: Our mission is to educate all learners to reach their full potential as contributing and productive members of our ever-changing global community.

div.a: Our department heads and staff are always happy to assist you in learning more about what we have to offer your child.
Get up to date with everything that's happening in our district!

p.a: Guidance and resources from the Minnesota Department of Health, local health agencies and the Centers for Disease Control

img.alt: female teacher with three elementary-age students

div.a: Prior Lake-Savage Area Schools is one of the few districts in the country that has received a U.S. Dept. of Ed. Green Ribbon School Sustainability Award.
Learn how technology is being used in all of our classrooms.

li.a: What Makes a Good ATLAS Student?

div.a: Our district offers a variety of program options to help all learners reach their full potential. From Spanish Immersion to the Fab Lab, there's something for everyone.
Prior Lake-Savage Area Schools is the first district to have all K-5 elementary E-STEM schools in the state of Minnesota.
Learn about our Kindergarten options & enrollment timeline

a.title: Select the school year to find your school
Select the school year to find your school

div.a: Select the applicable school year, then enter your address to find your school.
Explore the latest job openings in our district.
Visit the Employment page for information, including benefits and forms.
View our current classes and register!

div.p: E-STEM is an interdisciplinary approach to instruction and learning focused on inquiry and real world problem-solving...
Our mission is to educate all learners to reach their full potential as contributing and productive members of our ever-changing global community.

section.class: fsElement fsCalendar fsSlideshow home-calendar-slider fsItemCount_15 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.a: Regular Meeting of the Board of Education

div.p: of parents rate our staff as excellent or good

div.div:

img.alt: U.S. Department of Education - Green Ribbon Schools
